shortDescription: Open redirect vulnerability in redirect.php in Bitrix Site Manager 6.5 allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks via a URL in the goto parameter.
vulnerabilityName: bitrix24 bitrix_site_manager URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
